UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification of multiple antimicrobial peptides from the skin of fine-spined frog, Hylarana spinulosa (Ranidae).
Literature.Author: Yang X, Hu Y, Xu S, Hu Y, Meng H, Guo C, Liu Y, Liu J, Yu Z, Wang H
